name: breakfast

A1 a meal eaten in the morning as the first meal of the day: What do you want for breakfast? Jane never eats breakfast. She arrived shortly after breakfast. Breakfast is served in the dining room from 8.30 till 10.00. I love to eat breakfast in bed on Saturdays.
More examplesFewer examplesMy husband dresses the children while I make breakfast.He usually goes jogging for half an hour before breakfast.He likes to have breakfast in bed on a Saturday morning.I have toast and marmalade for breakfast.Come on, wake up - breakfast is ready.
